content: Since the start of the pandemic, Google has rolled out various updates to help people get COVID-related information. From information on symptoms of the COVID-19 to prevention, testing, and treatment, Google has got you covered.
title: How To Use Google To Get COVID Related Information

content: Eight months after the vaccine rollout, here’s how vaccinated is India and the world against COVID-19
title: How Vaccinated Is India And The World Against COVID-19?
